title: Unchanged PIDs for new version
description:
During correction of issues:
- https://errata.es-doc.org/static/view.html?uid=7f680e48-6bfd-60a1-9e10-0d4acdc0fdb0
- https://errata.es-doc.org/static/view.html?uid=54720dfd-7c8f-7a68-9986-ceac4b77ffd0
- https://errata.es-doc.org/static/view.html?uid=6f1ce955-84de-c62b-9a62-9fb7422369f2
- https://errata.es-doc.org/static/view.html?uid=74e3e6f3-b132-f589-b379-45959ecf4b03
File tracking IDS or PIDs was keep unchanged. Consequently, affected dataset version 20180717 have been unpublished, and replaced by a new version 20180720 with new PIDs in file.
